text: allaah kee bandagee karo aur usake saath kisee ko saajhee na banao aur achchha vyavahaar karo maan-baap ke saath, naatedaaron, anaathon aur muhataajon ke saath, naatedaar padosiyon ke saath aur aparichit padosiyon ke saath aur saath rahanevaale vyakti ke saath aur musaafir ke saath aur unake saath bhee jo tumhaare qabze mein hon. allaah aise vyakti ko pasand nahin karata, jo itaraata aur deengen maarata ho
